pr_title: Add secrets to environment for publishing.

timeline.message: Add secrets to environment for publishing.

timeline.bodyText: does the variance in whitespace make any difference here?
timeline.author: jkwatson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -65,3 +65,6 @@ jobs:
           remote-build-cache-proxy-enabled: false
           # TODO(anuraaga): Remove version specifier after next release creates a tag on master.
           arguments: artifactoryPublish -Prelease.version=0.10.0-SNAPSHOT
+        env:
+          BINTRAY_USER: ${{ secrets.BINTRAY_USER }}
+          BINTRAY_KEY: ${{secrets.BINTRAY_KEY }}

replies.bodyText: Which whitespace? Are you referring to the difference in the length of the word USER vs KEY? :P
replies.author: anuraaga
jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Thanks my eyes just could not find that (no coffee yet is a problem)
